subject: p16672854
Findings: Bilateral lung volumes are low. Since, mild pulmonary vascular congestion and pulmonary edema has worsened. Small bilateral pleural effusions are unchanged. Mildly enlarged heart size and some mediastinal widening is worse than before. Status post median sternotomy with intact sternal sutures.
Impression: Mild pulmonary edema, mild pulmonary edema and mild-to-moderate cardiomegaly with some mediastinal widening is worsened since .
